label: Folder 62: Whitelaw Letter
description: Letter dated Apr. 23, 1948, from Robert N.S. Whitelaw, Director of the Carolina Art Association, to C. Bissell Jenkins, Jr., President of Historic Charleston Foundation.  Encloses corrected by-laws, lists HCF officers, and outlines the terms of each Trustee.

metadata.label: Description
